title: Companion app
body:
How about a companion app which allows account integration so that runes and masteries can be updated on the go. 

Could include champ stats and match history as well as links to 3rd party site info like probuild and champion select.

replies.body: Why would you want that on an app?
so that you can do runes and masteries on the go....

And you would do that why?

Like why is that a requirement?

Just do it on your computer where it's easier.
